title: LISTEN: The Debate - Jan 23: Ian Wright and Michael Appleton
description: Listen to the latest edition of The Debate as Ian Wright and Michael Appleton joined  Geoff Shreeves to discuss all the big talking points.
content: In part one, the panel discuss Phil Neville's appointment as head coach of England Women and what the former Manchester United defender can bring to the role.Wright and Appleton have the final say on Alexis Sanchez and Henrikh Mkhitaryan's swap deal, with Gunners legend Wright labelling Arsenal's handling of the situation as "terrible".UEFA's plans to halt the influence of agents on football is next on the agenda before Marco Silva sacking goes under the spotlight and the panel answer YOUR questions.All that and more in the latest The Debate podcast.Listen to The Debate and subscribe to more podcasts via iTunes
